title: FT PASSENGER DEMANDED TAXI-DRIVER TO BEAT RED LIGHT, SNATCH HIS PHONE
text:
FT PASSENGER DEMANDED TAXI-DRIVER TO BEAT RED LIGHT, SNATCH HIS PHONE   Advertisement 
<Facebook post by Glenn Wong> 
Abuse of taxi driver demand taxi driver to beat the light snatch my phone deleted my things and accused I push him.LTA pls see how taxi driver are being abuse by FT.if he can snatch my phone and delete my personal things what else FT can do in future.he even admitted that comfort is a protected company that mean can abuse of CDG driver?the video he deleted Wan is i talk to him very nicely till he snatch my phone.what u guys see Wan is the second and third video.and the photo prove tat he snatch my phone while charging. 
Part 2 till I tell him is a snatch theft then he return me bk the phone and accused me for pushing him guys.$10 Pomo somemore and still much demand think what here India taxi. 
Part 3 proven snatched my phone while I was changing my phone till USB also come out Source:
